sentences.sContent: ...the ultimate triumph of communism in the world.
sentences.sCn: …共产主义在全世界的最终胜利。

remMethod.val: commun(看作common， 共有的)+ism (表主义的名词后缀) →财产共有→共产主义

words.tran: 共产主义的；共产主义者的

trans.tranOther: a political system in which the government controls the production of all food and goods, and there is no privately owned property
